commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: High Level Forum for a Better Functioning Food Supply Chain#E03337#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3337#Member#C#Expert Group for Markets and Trade in Fishery and Aquaculture Products#E02797#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2797#Member#C#Advisory Group on the Food Chain and Animal and Plant Health#E00860#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=860#Member#C#Animal Health Advisory Committee
goals__remit:
Represents the EU fish processors and traders vis-à-vis the EU institutions. 
Contributes to consultations made by EU institutions as regards policy issues affecting fishery and aquaculture products processing and trading.
